snippet: A new book about Victorian curiosities under glass; a new book about George Catlin, who painted American Indians; and autobiographies of early polar explorers.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; Under Glass: Victorian Obsession by John Whitenight, examines Victorian curiosities; Smithsonian Institution is lending George Catlin paintings to the National Portrait Gallery for London show, among other exhibitions; Bonhams in New York will auction collection of early Arctic exploration books.
lead_paragraph: A new book about Victorian curiosities under glass; a new book about George Catlin, who painted American Indians; and autobiographies of early polar explorers.

headline.main: Victorian Collections Capture Worlds Under Glass
